+ #!/bin/bash

+ # Script t·ª± ƒë·ªông ch·∫°y t·∫•t c·∫£ SQL scripts demo data cho c√°c database
+ # S·ª≠ d·ª•ng: ./run-demo-data.sh [path-to-env-file]
+ # M·∫∑c ƒë·ªãnh: ./run-demo-data.sh .env
+ 
+ set -e
+ 
+ # M√†u s·∫Øc cho output
+ GREEN='\033[0;32m'
+ YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
+ RED='\033[0;31m'
+ NC='\033[0m' # No Color
+ 
+ # L·∫•y ƒë∆∞·ªùng d·∫´n file .env
+ ENV_FILE=${1:-.env}
+ 
+ if [ ! -f "$ENV_FILE" ]; then
+     echo -e "${RED}‚ùå File .env kh√¥ng t·ªìn t·∫°i: $ENV_FILE${NC}"
+     echo "S·ª≠ d·ª•ng: ./run-demo-data.sh [path-to-env-file]"

+ echo ""

+ # H√†m parse connection string t·ª´ JDBC URL
+ parse_db_connection() {
+     local jdbc_url=$1
+     # jdbc:postgresql://host:port/database
+     local url_part=$(echo $jdbc_url | sed 's/jdbc:postgresql:\/\///')
+     local host_port=$(echo $url_part | cut -d'/' -f1)
+     local db_name=$(echo $url_part | cut -d'/' -f2)
+     local host=$(echo $host_port | cut -d':' -f1)
+     local port=$(echo $host_port | cut -d':' -f2)
+     
+     echo "$host|$port|$db_name"
+ }
+ 
+ # H√†m ch·∫°y SQL script
+ run_sql_script() {
+     local service_name=$1
+     local script_path=$2
+     local host=$3
+     local port=$4
+     local db_name=$5
+     local username=$6
+     local password=$7
+     
+     echo -e "${YELLOW}üìù ƒêang ch·∫°y script cho $service_name...${NC}"
+     echo "  Script: $script_path"
+     echo "  Database: $host:$port/$db_name"

+         echo -e "${RED}  ‚ö†Ô∏è  File kh√¥ng t·ªìn t·∫°i: $script_path${NC}"
+         return 1
+     fi
+     
+     PGPASSWORD=$password psql -h $host -p $port -U $username -d $db_name -f "$script_path" &gt; /dev/null 2&gt;&amp;1
+     
+     if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
+         echo -e "${GREEN}  ‚úÖ Th√†nh c√¥ng!${NC}"
+         return 0
+     else
+         echo -e "${RED}  ‚ùå L·ªói khi ch·∫°y script${NC}"
+         return 1
+     fi
+ }
+ 
+ # ƒê·ªçc th√¥ng tin database t·ª´ .env
+ source &lt;(grep -E '^(SPECIALIST|PROJECT|REQUEST)_DATASOURCE' $ENV_FILE | sed 's/^/export /')
+ 
+ # 1. Skills data (Specialist Service)
+ if [ -n "$SPECIALIST_DATASOURCE_URL" ]; then
+     IFS='|' read -r host port db_name &lt;&lt;&lt; "$(parse_db_connection $SPECIALIST_DATASOURCE_URL)"
+     username=${SPECIALIST_DATASOURCE_USERNAME:-postgres}
+     password=${SPECIALIST_DATASOURCE_PASSWORD}
+

+ # S·ª≠ d·ª•ng: .\run-demo-data.ps1 [path-to-env-file]

+ # H√†m parse connection string t·ª´ JDBC URL
+ function Parse-DbConnection {
+     param([string]$JdbcUrl)
+     
+     # jdbc:postgresql://host:port/database
+     $urlPart = $JdbcUrl -replace "jdbc:postgresql://", ""
+     $parts = $urlPart -split "/"
+     $hostPort = $parts[0]
+     $dbName = $parts[1]
+     $hostPortParts = $hostPort -split ":"
+     $host = $hostPortParts[0]
+     $port = $hostPortParts[1]
+     
+     return @{
+         Host = $host
+         Port = $port
+         Database = $dbName
+     }
+ }
+ 
+ # H√†m ch·∫°y SQL script
+ function Run-SqlScript {
+     param(
+         [string]$ServiceName,
+         [string]$ScriptPath,
+         [string]$Host,
+         [string]$Port,
+         [string]$Database,
+         [string]$Username,
+         [string]$Password
+     )
+     
+     Write-Host "üìù ƒêang ch·∫°y script cho $ServiceName..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
+     Write-Host "  Script: $ScriptPath"
+     Write-Host "  Database: ${Host}:${Port}/${Database}"
+     
+     if (-not (Test-Path $ScriptPath)) {
+         Write-Host "  ‚ö†Ô∏è  File kh√¥ng t·ªìn t·∫°i: $ScriptPath" -ForegroundColor Red
+         return $false
+     }
+     
+     # Set PGPASSWORD environment variable
+     $env:PGPASSWORD = $Password
+     
+     # Ch·∫°y psql
+     $psqlArgs = @(
+         "-h", $Host
+         "-p", $Port
+         "-U", $Username
+         "-d", $Database
+         "-f", $ScriptPath
+     )
+     
+     try {
+         $result = &amp; psql $psqlArgs 2&gt;&amp;1
+         if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) {
+             Write-Host "  ‚úÖ Th√†nh c√¥ng!" -ForegroundColor Green
+             return $true
+         } else {
+             Write-Host "  ‚ùå L·ªói khi ch·∫°y script" -ForegroundColor Red
+             Write-Host $result
+             return $false
+         }
+     } catch {
+         Write-Host "  ‚ùå L·ªói: $_" -ForegroundColor Red
+         return $false
+     } finally {
+         Remove-Item Env:\PGPASSWORD -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
+     }
+ }
+ 
+ # ƒê·ªçc file .env
+ $envContent = Get-Content $EnvFile | Where-Object { $_ -match '^[^#]' -and $_ -match '=' }
+ 
+ # Parse c√°c bi·∫øn m√¥i tr∆∞·ªùng
+ $envVars = @{}
+ foreach ($line in $envContent) {
+     if ($line -match '^([^=]+)=(.*)$') {
+         $key = $matches[1].Trim()
+         $value = $matches[2].Trim()
+         $envVars[$key] = $value
+     }
+ }
+ 
+ # 1. Skills data (Specialist Service)
+ if ($envVars.ContainsKey("SPECIALIST_DATASOURCE_URL")) {
+     $conn = Parse-DbConnection $envVars["SPECIALIST_DATASOURCE_URL"]
+     $username = if ($envVars.ContainsKey("SPECIALIST_DATASOURCE_USERNAME")) { $envVars["SPECIALIST_DATASOURCE_USERNAME"] } else { "postgres" }
+     $password = $envVars["SPECIALIST_DATASOURCE_PASSWORD"]
+     
+     $scriptPath = "..\..\backend\specialist-service\scripts\setup_skills_postgresql.sql"
+     Run-SqlScript "Specialist Service (Skills)" $scriptPath $conn.Host $conn.Port $conn.Database $username $password | Out-Null
+     Write-Host ""
+ }
+ 
+ # 2. Equipment data (Project Service)
+ if ($envVars.ContainsKey("PROJECT_DATASOURCE_URL")) {
+     $conn = Parse-DbConnection $envVars["PROJECT_DATASOURCE_URL"]
+     $username = if ($envVars.ContainsKey("PROJECT_DATASOURCE_USERNAME")) { $envVars["PROJECT_DATASOURCE_USERNAME"] } else { "postgres" }
+     $password = $envVars["PROJECT_DATASOURCE_PASSWORD"]

+     Write-Host ""
+

+     Run-SqlScript "Project Service (Studio)" $scriptPath $conn.Host $conn.Port $conn.Database $username $password | Out-Null
+     Write-Host ""
